metadataAttributes.Title: Mastering Final Cut Pro
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course unravels the post-production world for editors. Students will dive into the key features of Apple’s Final Cut Pro software for Video and Audio Editing and learn elements for creating professional videos with the use of transitions and effects, titles and motion graphics, color correction, 360 Video and Media Management.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Experience with video production is helpful,video terminology and while not required,Basic understanding of macOS helpful,
